title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-10.6 - Notification of adjusted base proportions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-10.6 - Notification of adjusted base proportions

State Regulations

The clerk of the legislative body of each homestead
assessing unit shall notify ORPTS of information for each class and for each
portion class pursuant to section
1903
of the Real Property Tax Law which
shall include but not be limited to documentation of the procedures and
computations used to adjust the current base proportions to arrive at the
adjusted base proportions and the data used in performing the procedures and
computations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-10.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
